name: Red Ladybug
description:
Ladybug - air filled cushion Total Diameter (including legs): 49cm (19 inch) Diameter (body): 32cm (12½ inch) Height: 9cm (3½ inch) Material: Soft plastic Usage: Inflate using a standard value and pump. Do not over inflate, leave some room to wiggle.


Caution: Not suitable for Children under 3 years. Exceeds all British and American Standards. Not for use in water, keep away from sharp objects and fire. Recommended body weight: Not over 100Kg Return policy: If the product arrives with a fault, please contact info@thebugscompany.com within 28 days. Free shipping in Hong Kong.
